I spotted an error in my example file, which should have h=r1 rather than h=r4 to match your sampling case:


##############
#@rfluxmtx o=results/sensors/daycoeff.dat


#@rfluxmtx h=u
void glow groundglow
0
0
4 1 1 1 0
groundglow source ground
0
0
4 0 0 -1 180


#@rfluxmtx h=r1 u=+Y
void glow skyglow
0
0
4 1 1 1 0
skyglow source sky
0
0
4 0 0 1 180
##############


-Greg
